author: hstern
msg: Added a rule to match 'New software uploaded by' spam that we've been missing.

author: craigmcc
msg: Close parsed input streams, to avoid the potential for leaving JAR files
locked on Windows after an undeploy (as with SHALE-274).  Webapps will still
need a version of Digester newer than 1.7 for the Digester part of the fix.

author: jkuhnert
msg: -) Added new ScriptIncludes component for scenerios where Shell can't be used. (like portlets)
-) Updated portlet documentation to point to ScriptIncludes component.
-) Added new "Development Guide" documentation section and wrote a page covering custom Exception pages.
-) Fixed Palette javascript + dojo validation to make client side validation of Palette requires work again.
-) Fixed workbench css styles to properly display validation messages in ie7.
-) Updated maven pom's to use "agreggate" to generate javadocs without having to configure each sub module
to dump its javadoc output to a single location.

author: dblevins
msg: Added the ability to search in just a specific set of URLs
